explanation: Combine terms with the same variables.
Multiply each term inside the parentheses by 5.
Factor out the greatest common factor, 4.
Add the exponents when multiplying powers with the same base.
Divide both the numerator and denominator by their greatest common factor (GCF), 5.
Isolate x by adding 7 to both sides and dividing by 3.
Multiply both the numerator and denominator by sqrt(2).
Use the FOIL method to expand.
